content:
Here is the cleaned up text:

Persist Secure Messaging History Across Multiple Devices with User Verification

Securely connect your customers to their messaging history and persist conversations across devices with user verification.

This feature is available in Lightning Experience. It applies to Messaging for In-App and Messaging for Web channels, but not Standard and enhanced WhatsApp, standard and enhanced Facebook Messenger, standard and enhanced SMS, enhanced Apple Messages for Business, and Bring Your Own Channel.

To set up this feature, you need Customize Application user permissions. User verification enables:

* Maximize data privacy with secure tokens that verify your customer's identity
* Allow conversations to persist across multiple devices
* Enable asynchronous conversations
* Extend your customer's access to their Messaging for Web conversation history

Important: User verification is not supported with Experience Builder or Commerce Cloud sites, and can't be used alongside unverified users in mobile apps.

Understanding User Verification
Set Up User Verification
Troubleshooting User Verification
User Verification Terms
title: Secure Messaging History Across Devices
